138282586133313863.Text: Snow bears are larger cousins of Solstheim's normal bears, and are known for their thick white fur. They are elusive, but have been seen in the snowy forested regions along Solstheim's southern coast.  It is said their attacks have been known to freeze human flesh, and their fur protects them against the frost and cold.

2776324218122586917.Text: Snow wolves are larger cousins of Solstheim's normal wolves, and are said to be descendents of Ondjage, the Fell Wolf that devoured Hrothmund the Red.  They are elusive, but can be found in and around the Moesring Mountains.  It is said their attacks have been known to freeze human flesh, and their fur protects them against the frost and cold.

2087519112815410551.Text: Brynjolfr will make custom snow wolf and snow bear fur armor to order.  It's light armor, and can offer some protection against frost.  Brynjolfr has given me a list of requirements and prices.  If I have the animal pelts and gold, he'll begin work on a custom piece of armor, and have it ready in a day.
